Verses: 1 yoodhaavin Kumaarar, Paares, Esron, Karmee, Oor, Sobaal Enbavargal.
2 sobaalin Kumaaran Raayaa Yaagaaththaip Petraan; Yaagaadh Agumaayiyaiyum Laagaadhaiyum Petraan; Soraaththiyarin Vamsangal Ivaigale.
3 edhaam Ennum Mooppanin Sandhadhiyaar, Yesreyel, Ishmaa, Idhpaas Enbavargal; Ivargaludaiya Sagodhariyin Per Adhselelponi;
4 kedhorukku Mooppanaana Penuvel, Ushaavukku Mooppanaana Eser Enbavargal; Ivargal Bethlegemukku Mooppanaana Epraaththaavukku Mudharpirandha Oorin Kumaarar.
5 thekkovaavukku Mooppanaana Asoorukku Elaal, Naaraal Ennum Irandu Penjaadhigal Irundhaargal.
6 naaraal Avanukku Agusaamaiyum, Epperaiyum, Themaniyaiyum, Aagaasthaariyaiyum Petraal; Naaraalin Kumaarargal Ivargale.
7 elaalin Kumaarar, Seredh, Edhsogaar, Edhnaan Enbavargal.
8 kos Enbavan Anoobaiyum, Sobepaagaiyum, Aarumin Kumaaranaagiya Agarkelin Vamsangalaiyum Petraan.
9 yaabes Than Sagodhararaippaarkkilum Ganampetravanaayirundhaan. Avan Thaai: Naan Dhukkaththode Avanaip Petren Endru Solli Avanukku Yaabes Endru Perittaal.

10 yaabes Isravelin Dhevanai Nokki: Dhevareer Ennai Aaseervadhiththu, En Ellaiyaip Peridhaakki, Umadhu Karam Ennodirundhu, Theengu Ennai Dhukkappaduththaadhapadikku Adharku Ennai Vilakkik Kaaththarulum Endru Vendikkondaan; Avan Vendikkondadhai Dhevan Arulinaar.
11 soogaavin Sagodharanaagiya Keloop Mekeeraip Petraan; Ivan Esthonin Thagappan.
12 esthon Pedhraabaavaiyum, Paseyaagaiyum, Irnaagaashin Thagappanaagiya Theginaagaiyum Petraan; Ivargal Regaavoor Manushar.
13 kenaasin Kumaarar, Odhniyel, Seraayaa Enbavargal; Odhniyelin Kumaararil Oruvan Aaththaadh.
14 meyonaththaai Opiraavaip Petraan; Seraayaa Karaasheeman Pallaththaakkukku Mooppanaagiya Yovaabaip Petraan; Avargal Thozhilaaligalaayirundhaargal.
15 eppunneyin Kumaaranaagiya Kaalebin Kumaarar, Eeru, Elaa, Naagaam; Elaavin Kumaararil Oruvan Kenaas.
16 ekalelelin Kumaarar, Seep, Seeppaa, Thiriyaa, Asaareyel.
17 esraavin Kumaarar, Yethther, Meredh, Epper, Yaalon; Mereththin Penjaadhi Miriyaamaiyum, Sammaayiyaiyum, Esthemovaa Oorukku Mooppanaana Ispaavaiyum Petraal.

18 avan Penjaadhiyaagiya Egudhiyaal, Kedhorin Thagappanaagiya Yaaredhaiyum, Sokkovin Thagappanaagiya Eperaiyuma, Sanovaavin Thagappanaagiya Ekkuththiyelaiyum Petraal; Meredh Vivaagam Pannina Paarvonin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Piththiyaalin Kumaarar Ivargale.
19 naagaamin Sagodhariyaagiya Odhiyaavinudaiya Penjaadhiyin Kumaarar Karmiyanaagiya Aabigeyilaavum, Maagaaththiyanaagiya Esthemovaavume.
20 sheemonin Kumaarar, Amnon, Rinnaa, Penkaanaan, Theelon Enbavargal, Ishiyin Kumaarar, Sogedhum Pensogedhume.
21 yoodhaavin Kumaaranaagiya Selaagin Puththirar: Lekkaavoor Mooppanaana Erum Maresaar Mooppanaana Laadhaagum, Melliya Pudavai Neydha Aspeyaa Veettuvamsangalum,
22 yoyaakkeemum, Kosebaavin Manusharum, Movaabiyarai Aanda Yovaas, Saaraab Enbavargalum, Yasupilegemume; Ivaigal Poorvakaalaththin Seydhigal.
23 ivargal Kuyavaraayirundhu Neththaayimilum Kedheraavilum Kudiyirundhaargal; Raajaavin Velaiyai Visaarikkiradharku Ange Vaasampanninaargal
24 simiyonin Kumaarar, Nemuvel,yaamin, Yaareep, Seraa, Savul Enbavargal.
25 ivan Kumaaran Salloom; Ivan Kumaaran Mipsaam; Ivan Kumaaran Mismaa.
26 mismaavin Kumaararil Oruvan Ammuvel; Ivan Kumaaran Sakkoor; Ivan Kumaaran Seemeyi.
27 seemeyikkup Padhinaaru Kumaararum Aaru Kumaaraththigalum Irundhaargal; Avan Sagodhararukku Anegam Pillaigal Irundhadhillai; Avargal Vamsamellaam Yoodhaavin Puththiraippolap Peruginadhumillai.
28 avargal Peyersebaavilum, Molaadhaavilum, Aadhsaarkuvaavilum,
29 pillaavilum, Edhsaamilum, Tholaadhilum,
30 peththoovelilum, Ormaavilum, Siklaagilum,
31 pedhmaarkaaboththilum, Aadhsaarsoosimilum, Pedhpiriyilum, Saaraayimilum Kudiyirundhaargal; Dhaaveedhu Raajaavaagumattum Ivaigal Avargal Pattanangalaayirundhadhu.
32 avargaludaiya Pettaigal, Eththaam, Aayin, Rimmon, Thogen, Aasaan Ennum Aindhu Pattanangal.
33 andha Pattanangalai Sutrilum, Paagaalmattumulla Avargaludaiya Ellaap Pettaigalum, Avargal Vaasasthalangalum, Avargaludaiya Vamsa Attavanaiyum Ivaigale.
34 mesobaabum, Yamlegum, Amadhsiyaavin Kumaaran Yoshaavum,
35 yovelum, Aasiyelin Magan Seraayaavukkup Pirandha Yosibiyaavin Kumaaran Ekoovum,
36 eliyonaayum, Yaakkobaavum, Yesogaayaavum, Asaayaavum, Aadhiyelum, Yesimiyelum Penaayaavum,
37 semaayaa Petra Simriyin Magan Yedhaayaavukkup Pirandha Allonin Puththiranaagiya Seeppiyin Kumaaran Seesaavum Endru,
38 perperaai Ezhudhiyirukkira Ivargal Thangal Vamsangalil Prabukkalaayirundhaargal, Ivargal Pidhaakkalin Veettaar Eraalamaaip Parambinaargal.
39 thangal Aadugalukku Meychchalaith Thedumpadikku Thedhorin Ellaiyaagiya Pallaththaakkin Keezhppuramattum Poi,
40 nalla Sezhippaana Meychchalaiyum, Amarikkaiyum, Sugamumulla Visthaaramaana Dhesaththaiyum Kandupidiththaargal; Poorvaththile Kaamin Sandhadhiyaar Ange Kudiyirundhaargal.

41 perperaai Ezhudhiyirukkira Ivargal Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Esekkiyaavin Naatkalile Ange Poi, Ange, Kandupidiththavargalin Koodaarangalaiyum, Thaabarangalaiyum Azhiththu, Innaalile Irukkiradhupola, Avargalai Sangaarampanni, Ange Thangal Aadugalukkumeychchal Irundhapadiyinaal, Avargal Andha Sthalaththile Kudiyerinaargal.

42 simiyonin Puththiraraagiya Ivargalil Ainnooru Manusharum, Avargal Thalaimaikkaararaagiya Ishiyin Kumaararaana Pelaththiyaavum, Negariyaavum, Reppaayaavum, Oosiyelum, Seyeer Malaiththesaththirkup Poi,
43 amalekkiyaril Thappi Meedhiyaayirundhavargalai Madangadiththu, Innaalvaraikkum Irukkirapadi Ange Kudiyerinaargal.
